entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
